Name: Dancing Archer Tinia
Special Ability: When using Desert Arrow, attacking speed increases by 30% for 3 second(s), and the damage inflicted by enemies decreases by 50%.

Name: Dragon Avatar Vishuvac
Special Ability: Damage inflicted on enemies that are not fire type increases by 25%, and damage inflicted on fire type enemies decreases by 25%.

Name: Eight-tailed Fox Nari
Special Ability: On hit, Def increases by 8% for 8 second(s). This effect can overlap up to 8 times.

Name: Executive Red Hood Arabelle

Name: Exorcist Miya
Special Ability: When using Wind of Passion, restores HP of the Party member with lowest HP by 20% of Heal.

Name: Flower Girl Bari
Special Ability: When spell bullets are recharged. Atk increases by 30% for 5 second(s).

Name: Future Princess
Special Ability: On hit, increases moving speed, weapon skill regen speed, Dimension Breaker's attacking speed by 20% for 2 second(s).

Name: Goddess of War Plitvice
Special Ability: When hit by enemies, nullifies the damage with 15% chance.

Name: Golem Rider Alef

Name: Grand Admiral Marina

Name: Idol Captain Eva
Special Ability: When using Sound Wave skill, restores the most depleted party members' HP by 5% and increases their Def by 30% for 5 second(s).

Name: Knight Lady Lapice
Special Ability: When hit by enemies, movement speed increases by 30% and Atk by 30% for 5 second(s).

Name: Mecha Warrior Oghma

Name: Movie Star Eugene
Special Ability: On melee attack hit, ranged Def and moving speed increase by 30% for 3 second(s).

Name: Noble Succubus Bianca
Special Ability: When hit by enemies, Atk increases by 30% for 3 second(s) and enemy's Atk decreases by 30%. 6 second(s) cooltime.

Name: Scrivener Lahn
Special Ability: Restores HP by 15% of the party member with HP lower than 50%. Fu of Resurrection can be exercised on each party member once.

Name: Aspiring Warrior Craig
Special Ability: Takes damage for party members with HP lower than 50% within 5 tiles. Activated only when Craig's HP is higher than 50%.

Name: Desert Mercenary Marvin
Special Ability: Atk increases by maximum 50% in proportion to lost HP.

Name: Dimension Traveler Catherine
Special Ability: When HP hits 0, recovers 10% HP instantly, becomes invincible, and increases Atk by 50% for 3 second(s). 60 second(s) cooltime.

Name: Dragon Knight Shapira
Special Ability: When hit by enemies, Atk increases by 30% for 6 second(s).

Name: Dragon Talon Clan Ranpang

Name: Fire Dragon Girgas
Special Ability: After using a weapon skill, damage increases by 30% for 5 second(s)

Name: Innkeeper Loraine

Name: Leaf Fairy Aoba

Name: Mad Scientist Gremory
Special Ability: For each hit on enemies afflicted with Atk Decrease Effect, inflicts additional 30% damage.

Name: Male Knight
